title: UAS Dharwad Recruitment 2025 - Walk-in interview for Project Assistant Posts
description: The University of Agricultural Sciences, Dharwad (UAS Dharwad) has officially released the notification for an interview for the 01 Project Assistant posts. Interested and eligible candidates can use this opportunity to apply for these posts before the last date of application. Candidates who have completed their  B.Sc.  Candidates can apply for the UAS Dharwad Recruitment 2025 . The candidates who are interested in applying can attend the interview.
